title: I cant upgrade my Legendary skin shard ?
body:
- I own the champion. 
- I have 2000 Essence, it takes 1500

I can upgrade all other skinn shards, just not my Legendary shards.... any help ?

replies.body: Have you tried checking to see if you already own the skin?

haha thanks mate ! 

Dunno why, I never unlucked any Sion or Galio skinns.... but now they are both unlucked... strange, but nice! ty!
